survey_name: Banking App Security Features Preference Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand customer preferences and concerns regarding security features in mobile banking applications to enhance user trust and experience.

questions.question_text: Which of the following security features do you currently use in your mobile banking app? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. Ensure options are clearly distinct to avoid overlap.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE. Randomize option order to minimize bias.

script.question_text: Which of the following security features do you currently use in your mobile banking app? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the security features provided by your mobile banking app?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Label all points for clarity.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE. Display as radio buttons.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the security features provided by your mobile banking app?

questions.question_text: What additional security features would you like to see in your mobile banking app?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture unlisted preferences. Limit response to 200 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: OPEN_TEXT. Use a text input box with character counter.

script.question_text: What additional security features would you like to see in your mobile banking app?

questions.question_text: Have you ever experienced a security breach or unauthorized access to your mobile banking app?
questions.client_notes: Use a neutral tone to avoid causing alarm. Include 'I'm not sure' for accuracy.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE. Display as radio buttons.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your mobile banking app to others based on its security features?
